(OOC: If you want to know what the Spark blast is, check my character's
profile.  I assure you, it's a legal move with next to deadly consequences).

Pegasus kept running.  He could see the Ark in the distance.  He activated
his com link and set out a distress signal (a real one).
He then turned to face his assailants.

"All right, Predacons.  You may think you got me but you haven't seen my
true power!"  Pegasus' chest plate opened up and his spark was revealed.
The molecules of the spark began moving faster and faster.  Lightning began
flickering inside and outside of the spark.
